snippet: France and Italy will keep pressure on Germany this week to use government money to revive the euro zone's stagnating economy but in a sign of inertia, a promised list of projects to create growth will not be ready until December....

headline.print_headline: Euro Zone Seeks to Soften German Opposition to Stimulus Spending
headline.main: Euro Zone Seeks to Soften German Opposition to Stimulus Spending

lead_paragraph: France and Italy will keep pressure on Germany this week to use government money to revive the euro zone's stagnating economy but in a sign of inertia, a promised list of projects to create growth will not be ready until December.
